name: Olivka's Adventures
description:
This game is a platformer in which you play as Olivka. Your goal is to sneak into the base of the evil Maslina and destroy him, along with the base! But will you succeed? At the end of each act you will be waited for by a henchman of the Maslina, which you will have to defeat. Good luck saving the world, {USERNAME}! 

also thanks to mango-ki for tilesets and some sprites - https://mango-ki.itch.io/
